attributes.action: Save Woolworths from closing its doors for good !
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As of this evening (26/11/08) Woolworths have gone into administration.

Not only is it a national icon on the High Street Woolworths has more than 800 stores across the U.K. selling goods from candy to appliances. 
The 30,000 employees of the company,s jobs are in jeopardy, along with their Christmases 

The government has bailed out all the greedy banks... We the signatories want you to save Woolworths

What ever needs to be done. 

Pay the debt,
Find a buyer,
Shake up the management,

You have the answers to save our Woolworths and make it great again

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
